attributes.action: Give Canadians, Australians and New Zealanders the right to work in the UK
attributes.background:
Post-Brexit, we need to strengthen our relationship with old friends.

As a powerful political statement, the UK government should unilaterally give the right to Australians, Canadians and New Zealanders to come work in the UK without a visa.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554372
